DataElement.preferredName: Collection Participant Summary Sex Person Gender Text Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.:Someone who takes part in an activity.:A shortened version of a speech or written text, containing only the main points._The assemblage of physical properties or qualities by which male is distinguished from female; the physical difference between male and female; the distinguishing peculiarity of male or female. (from On-line Medical Dictionary)_Text designations that identify gender.   Gender is described as the assemblage of properties that distinguish people on the basis of their societal roles.

(from On-line Medical Dictionary)

Property.preferredDefinition: The assemblage of physical properties or qualities by which male is distinguished from female; the physical difference between male and female; the distinguishing peculiarity of male or female. (from On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: The assemblage of physical properties or qualities by which male is distinguished from female; the physical difference between male and female; the distinguishing peculiarity of male or female.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Text designations that identify gender.   Gender is described as the assemblage of properties that distinguish people on the basis of their societal roles.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An individual who reports belonging to the cultural gender role distinction of male.

Concepts.definition: An individual who reports belonging to the cultural gender role distinction of male.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not stated explicitly or in detail.

Concepts.definition: Not stated explicitly or in detail.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An individual who reports belonging to the cultural gender role distinction of female.

Concepts.definition: An individual who reports belonging to the cultural gender role distinction of female.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person (one of unisexual specimens) who is born with genitalia and/or secondary sexual characteristics of indeterminate sex, or which combine features of both sexes.

Concepts.definition: A person (one of unisexual specimens) who is born with genitalia and/or secondary sexual characteristics of indeterminate sex, or which combine features of both sexes.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: general description of an individual's physical appearance and vital status.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

Concepts.definition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueDomain.origin: NCISTD: NCI CRF Harmonization and Standards Initiative
ValueDomain.changeDescription: Working with EVS to Updated Permissible Values to Reflect requested terms in "Representation of Sex and Gender 06202005.doc. Replaces v1.0 with shortened permissible values of 'Female' and 'Male'. Replaces v2.0 with a Value Domain that has shortened permissible values of 'Male' and 'Female'. 4/4/2012/dmr: two values that were erroneously added perhaps during a model load were removed (Female Gender and Male Gender) without a version change, since these two values were not part of the vetted value set.
